channel.title: Music on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Music on Blog

item.title: Flow Music
item.description: What helps you get “in the zone” or into a “flow state”? Music does! This post links to some of my favorite music for concentration, maybe you’ll find something you like. Thanks to a musical upbringing, my tastes are all over the place. Quoting the great Duke Ellington: There are two kinds of music. Good music, and the other kind. Genre doesn’t matter, so long as the music’s good!
